title: Legendários
overview: Legendários (Legendary) aims to bring fun to Saturday nights, the idealized program and presented by Marcos Mion has in its DNA the search for quality entertainment, the creative mood and well, going away from humiliation, prejudice and lack of scruples, many often seen in the current TV. Its talented team of reporters and presenters ooze attitude and irreverence, provoking questions relevant to our society or simply offering good moments of relaxation and entertainment.Another great advantage of the Legendary is the interaction with the viewer and Internet users, that can accompany the program and join the Internet through Legendary Web , another attraction with unique content for the Internet, aimed at those who want a "complete experience". Modern and innovative, the Legendary proves that it is possible to talk about something serious with humor and mood do very seriously.
